comments.body: This should be mocked for now, and probably would be better to be consistently reported as the same value for all conditions calculated in this scenario (i.e. if we are setting 3 conditions we should set the times to all of them).

We will always set one `ReplicaFailure` condition at a time, either with 1 or with 100 pods failing. Not sure what's the added value in mocking this, since it's purely informational and we don't use it anywhere (deployment conditions _may_ use it).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +134,138 @@		Type:               condType,
		Status:             status,
		LastTransitionTime: unversioned.Now(),
		Reason:             reason,
		Message:            msg,
